description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Tweed Heads, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Convenient Coolangatta Apartment Escape Moments from the Beach with Two Pools & Tennis Courts
hotels.description: Discover a world of coastal bliss in Coolangatta with a stylish stay in Gold Coast's most southerly tip, situated moments from the surf-friendly shores of Coolangatta Beach. Take a dip in the property's heated indoor and outdoor pools, tee off at the mini golf course and serve and volley it up at the tennis courts. After a day of exploring the scenic Marine Parade, visiting Greenmount Beach and Rainbow Bay, retreat to your spacious room or apartment, imbued with all modern amenities. The adjacent Twin Towns Services Club is home to a number of restaurants for all your culinary needs, or you can take advantage of the on-site BBQ facilities to whip up a feast of your own.

seo.title: Hoteles en Tweed Heads - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Tweed Heads, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
